test_cases.test_name: LIMS System Installation and Setup Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the LIMS installation completes successfully with all configured parameters in the test environment.

test_steps.action: Execute the LIMS installer with administrative privileges to start the setup.
test_steps.expected_result: The installer completes and displays a message indicating a successful installation.

acceptance_criteria: All installer processes complete without errors
Installation log verified and stored
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trails must record installation events
Electronic signatures need to be captured where applicable
urs_requirements: Installation prerequisites as per URS Document
Compliance with change management process

test_cases.test_name: Sample Management and Chain of Custody Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that the system correctly registers samples, tracks their movement, and records complete audit trails for chain of custody.

test_steps.action: Register a new sample using barcode input and verify the automatic audit trail creation.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is registered successfully with an accurate audit trail entry.

acceptance_criteria: Accurate sample registration verified
Complete chain of custody records generated
data_integrity_requirements: Electronic records must secure audit trails
urs_requirements: Sample Management requirements per URS Document

test_cases.test_name: Test Method Management Workflow Response Time Check
test_cases.objective: Ensure that the test method workflow approval and execution responses meet the performance criteria under load conditions.
prerequisites: Test methods are pre-configured in the system

test_steps.action: Initiate a test method workflow and monitor the response time during approval gate processing.
test_steps.expected_result: The system processes the workflow with a response time consistently under 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Response times are consistently below 2 seconds
No performance degradation is observed under nominal load
data_integrity_requirements: Timestamps across logs must be synchronized for complete audit trails
urs_requirements: Test Method Management specifications as per URS

test_cases.test_name: Electronic Signature Security and Compliance Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that electronic signatures are implemented securely in compliance with both 21 CFR Part 11 and internal security policies.
prerequisites: User access controls are in place
Digital certificates are available for encryption

test_steps.action: Perform an electronic signature on a record using two-factor authentication.
test_steps.expected_result: The electronic signature is accepted, securely logged, and an audit trail entry is created.

acceptance_criteria: Signature is validated according to regulatory requirements
Audit trail accurately reflects secure signing actions
data_integrity_requirements: Audit logs must be immutable and include exact timestamps and user identifiers
urs_requirements: Security requirements for electronic signatures as defined in the URS

test_cases.test_name: Quality Control Batch Release and OOS Workflow Verification
test_cases.objective: Test the integrity and accuracy of the batch release process including the triggering and management of out-of-specification investigations.

test_steps.action: Simulate a batch release process and trigger an out-of-specification (OOS) event in the system.
test_steps.expected_result: The system enforces quality control checks and records all investigation steps in the audit log.

acceptance_criteria: All quality control steps are executed and verified
Audit logs are complete and compliant with regulatory standards
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trails must capture all events in the batch release and investigation process
urs_requirements: Quality Control and Release requirements as specified in the URS

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Integration with ERP and MES Systems Validation
test_cases.objective: Confirm that real-time data exchange between LIMS, ERP, and MES systems operates seamlessly without any data loss.
prerequisites: ERP and MES test environments are accessible

test_steps.action: Trigger data synchronization between LIMS, ERP, and MES and monitor the data flow.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is transmitted accurately and in real time across all connected systems.

acceptance_criteria: Successful data exchange is confirmed without discrepancies
Integrated systems show consistent data records
data_integrity_requirements: End-to-end audit trail of data transmission must be maintained
urs_requirements: Integration interfaces must comply with URS and regulatory standards

test_cases.test_name: Database Backup and Recovery Process Integrity Check
test_cases.objective: Verify that database backup and recovery procedures maintain data integrity in a simulated failure scenario.

test_steps.action: Initiate a database backup followed by a restore operation to simulate a failure recovery.
test_steps.expected_result: The database is restored correctly with complete data integrity maintained.

acceptance_criteria: No data loss occurs during backup and restoration
All records are successfully verified post-recovery
regulatory_basis: Data integrity requirements as defined in URS
data_integrity_requirements: Complete data capture on both backup and restoration processes
Audit trails for recovery operations must be maintained
urs_requirements: Backup and recovery specifications must adhere to the URS

test_cases.test_name: Environmental Monitoring Integration for Storage Locations
test_cases.objective: Assess the integration of environmental monitoring devices with the LIMS for managing storage conditions effectively.

test_steps.action: Link sensor data feed with the storage management module and validate real-time updates.
test_steps.expected_result: The system displays current environmental data and triggers alerts if thresholds are exceeded.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time data integration is confirmed
Alerts are generated as specified during abnormal conditions
data_integrity_requirements: Environmental data must include accurate timestamps and sensor values
urs_requirements: Integration of environmental monitoring as specified in the URS

test_cases.test_name: User Access Control and Privilege Management Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that role-based access control and privilege management functions as defined in the URS and complies with regulatory standards.
prerequisites: Role definitions are established in the system

test_steps.action: Attempt access to restricted modules using various user roles to verify privilege enforcement.
test_steps.expected_result: Access is granted or denied correctly based on user privileges with full audit logging.

acceptance_criteria: Access control policies are enforced consistently
Audit reports accurately reflect all access events
data_integrity_requirements: Every access event must be logged with user details and timestamps
urs_requirements: User access and privilege management requirements as outlined in the URS

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Performance Under Concurrent Users Load Test
test_cases.objective: Evaluate LIMS system performance under a simulated load of 200+ concurrent users to ensure system responsiveness and stability.

test_steps.action: Simulate 200+ concurrent users performing various operations on the LIMS system.
test_steps.expected_result: The system maintains stability with critical operations responding in under 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: System performance is maintained under heavy load
All critical operations meet the required response time criteria
regulatory_basis: Performance requirements as specified in the URS
data_integrity_requirements: Concurrent transaction logs must be accurate and complete
urs_requirements: Performance testing requirements specified in the URS

test_cases.test_name: LIMS System Installation Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the LIMS system is installed properly and initial configuration settings are applied as per URS.

test_steps.action: Initiate installation of the LIMS system using the provided installation package and follow documented procedures.
test_steps.expected_result: System installs successfully with all modules configured and ready for further validation.

acceptance_criteria: Installation process completes with a 0 error log
System displays the correct version number and components are accessible
data_integrity_requirements: System audit trails must capture installation events
urs_requirements: URS must detail installation prerequisites and configuration management

test_cases.test_name: Sample Management Functional Verification
test_cases.objective: Test and validate the sample management module with automated registration, barcode integration, and chain of custody features.

test_steps.action: Enter sample details into the system and scan the barcode to register the sample, then verify chain of custody records are created.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is registered successfully with an accurate chain of custody log that includes timestamp and operator details.

acceptance_criteria: Sample registration and tracking meet documented URS requirements
Chain of custody log is complete and accurate
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trails must be immutable and complete
urs_requirements: URS requires automated sample management and chain of custody functionality

test_cases.test_name: System Performance Under Load Testing
test_cases.objective: Evaluate system performance by simulating concurrent usage of 200+ users and measuring response times for critical operations.
prerequisites: Environment set up for performance testing

test_steps.action: Simulate 200 concurrent users performing typical LIMS operations and measure response times.
test_steps.expected_result: Critical operations execute within a 2-second response time threshold under load conditions.

acceptance_criteria: System meets the performance criteria as defined in the URS
No significant degradation in response time observed
data_integrity_requirements: Performance data must be recorded and stored securely
urs_requirements: URS specifies a maximum response time of less than 2 seconds for critical operations

test_cases.test_name: Electronic Signature Security Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the security and integrity of electronic signatures ensuring compliance with 21 CFR Part 11 requirements.
prerequisites: User accounts configured with electronic signature privileges

test_steps.action: Attempt to sign a document using an electronic signature and verify the authentication and audit trails are recorded.
test_steps.expected_result: Electronic signature is accepted only for authorized personnel and audit logs accurately capture the event.

acceptance_criteria: Electronic signatures comply with regulatory standards
Security controls prevent unauthorized signature usage
data_integrity_requirements: All signature events must be traceable and tamper-proof
urs_requirements: URS includes requirements for secure electronic signatures and audit trails

test_cases.test_name: Audit Trail Data Integrity Verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure the audit trails generated by the LIMS system accurately capture all user actions and data changes as per ALCOA+ standards.
prerequisites: Previous transactions recorded in the system

test_steps.action: Perform several data alteration actions and then review the audit trail logs for completeness and accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trails capture every change with appropriate timestamps, user identification, and action details.

acceptance_criteria: Audit logs fully comply with ALCOA+ principles
No discrepancies found between actions performed and audit trail entries
data_integrity_requirements: All audit trails must be preserved without alterations
urs_requirements: URS mandates comprehensive audit trail capabilities for data integrity management

test_cases.test_name: ERP and MES Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate the real-time data exchange and synchronization between the LIMS system and ERP/MES systems.
prerequisites: ERP and MES systems configured for integration

test_steps.action: Initiate data transfer between LIMS and ERP/MES systems and monitor for data synchronization errors.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is exchanged correctly with no latency or synchronization issues, and logs are generated.

acceptance_criteria: All integration points function as per URS specification
No data mismatch or lost transactions during synchronization
data_integrity_requirements: Integration logs must be secured and auditable
urs_requirements: URS includes detailed integration requirements with ERP, MES, and other enterprise systems

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Functional Verification
test_cases.objective: Test the custom workflow configurations, including analytical method validation and approval gates, for proper execution.
prerequisites: User roles and permissions set up

test_steps.action: Execute a test scenario using custom workflow steps from sample registration to method validation and capture.
test_steps.expected_result: The workflow executes in proper sequence with all approval gates functioning as expected.

acceptance_criteria: All custom workflow steps match URS and FS requirements
No deviations observed during process execution
data_integrity_requirements: Workflow logs must be complete and retrievable
urs_requirements: URS requires validation of custom workflows and process configurations

test_cases.test_name: Instrument Data Acquisition Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system seamlessly integrates with instruments such as chromatography and spectroscopy devices for data acquisition.

test_steps.action: Simulate data acquisition from connected instruments and confirm data is correctly imported into the LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Instrument data is acquired, processed, and stored in the system with correct time stamps and metadata.

acceptance_criteria: Data from instruments is integrated accurately as per system specifications
No data loss or misinterpretation occurs during transfer
data_integrity_requirements: Data integrity is maintained during instrument-to-system data exchange
urs_requirements: URS mandates connectivity with various analytical instruments for direct data acquisition

test_cases.test_name: High Availability and Disaster Recovery Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Assess the system’s ability to remain available and recover quickly in disaster recovery scenarios and peak load conditions.

test_steps.action: Simulate a disaster scenario by failing over system components and measure the time to recover full functionality.
test_steps.expected_result: System recovers with minimal downtime and all transactional data remains intact and accessible.

acceptance_criteria: System meets the high availability criteria as outlined in the URS
Disaster recovery process completes within accepted time limits
data_integrity_requirements: Backup and recovery logs must be tamper-proof and documented
urs_requirements: URS specifies the need for high availability and disaster recovery capabilities

test_cases.test_name: User Access Control Security Assessment
test_cases.objective: Evaluate the system’s user access controls and privilege management to ensure only authorized users can perform specific actions.

test_steps.action: Attempt access to restricted functions with both authorized and unauthorized user accounts and record the system responses.
test_steps.expected_result: System restricts unauthorized access, logs all attempts, and provides access only to authorized users.

acceptance_criteria: Access control mechanisms function as intended with proper logging
No security breaches occur during testing
data_integrity_requirements: Access logs must be immutable and securely stored
urs_requirements: URS requires robust user access control and detailed audit logging
